children.title: Tighten layout
children.prompt: Tighten layout; remove excess whitespace and prevent horizontal scroll; preserve padding for readability.

children.title: Floating copy box
children.prompt: Make the copy box float; position fixed to left side of viewport; remains visible while scrolling.

children.title: Responsive steps
children.prompt: Ensure responsive layout; elements stack on small screens and align inline on large.

children.title: Live binding
children.prompt: Bind input values directly to output field updates; changes appear live without reloading.

children.title: Debounce input
children.prompt: function debounce(fn, wait=200){ let t; return (...a)=>{ clearTimeout(t); t=setTimeout(()=>fn(...a), wait); }; }

children.title: Serialize to JSON
children.prompt: Serialize form data as JSON and store in localStorage; include timestamp and user ID.

children.title: Robust import
children.prompt: Ensure imported JSON restores all UI state correctly; handle invalid JSON safely.

children.title: Single combined copy
children.prompt: Generate a single combined copy box containing all sections separated by semicolons; easy to paste into Depot.

children.title: Multiple output modes
children.prompt: Allow multiple selectable output formats: Customer Summary (friendly), Engineer Notes (technical), Depot Format (semicolon).

children.title: Cache bust
children.prompt: Cache bust version; append ?v=[timestamp] to script and stylesheet imports.

children.title: Async/Defer assets
children.prompt: Optimise script loading; use async/defer; lazy-load heavy components.

children.title: Accessibility Checks
children.prompt:
- Add aria-labels/roles where needed
- Ensure tab order and visible focus ring
- Minimum contrast AA

children.title: QA / Safety
children.prompt:
- Validate inputs (postcode, phone)
- Handle network errors with friendly toasts
- Confirm destructive actions
- Provide offline fallback copy
